name: Valentine's Day Celebration
description: PARENTS: Bring 1 Valentine's card for each of the 22 friends in the class, leave the "To" section of the card blank. Wear PJs to school!

name: Father/Daughter Dance
description: Get excited!! The theme of this year's dances is: Denim and Diamonds! So bust out your best denim, bling, and/or western attire and dance the night away!

name: Mother/Son Dance
description: Get excited!! The theme of this year's dances is: Denim and Diamonds! So bust out your best denim, bling, and/or western attire and dance the night away!

name: Sports-Themed Shirt Spirit Day
description: PARENTS: Send child in sports-themed shirt

name: Galentine's Night Out at F45 Branham Park
description: 45 minutes of strength training work out followed by bubbles

name: Family Fun Night- Five Guys
description: Mention Los Alamitos and 25% of proceeds will be donated to the PTA!!

name: Family Fun Night- Five Guys
description: Mention Los Alamitos and 25% of proceeds will be donated to the PTA!!

name: Yearbook Cover Contest (5th Graders Only)
description: Entries due by February 23, 2026. Theme: Under the Sea. Include 'Los Alamitos' and '2025-2026'.

name: Variety Show - Volunteers & Important Info
description: We're gearing up for our upcoming Variety Show and need parent volunteers to help make it a success! Volunteer opportunities include Stage Hands and Concession Organizer. To apply to perform, submit audition videos by March 1st.

name: Variety Show Auditions
description: Audition videos due by Sunday, March 1st, 2026

name: Variety Show Dress Rehearsal
description: Dress Rehearsal for Variety Show

name: Variety Show
description: Variety Show performance

name: 5th Grade Baby Photos for Yearbook
description: 5th grade parents - start gathering those adorable baby photos for the 5th Grade Baby Pages! They are due by March 1st!

name: Yearbook Orders
description: Last day to order the 2025-26 Yearbook.

name: Middle School Selection Process
description: Families will submit school choice requests online through the School Choice section of Parent Portal, which will be open from January 20 through February 13, 2026.

name: Middle School Selection Process
description: Families will submit school choice requests online through the School Choice section of Parent Portal, which will be open from January 20 through February 13, 2026.

name: Reading Lab Volunteers Needed
description: The Reading Lab is a tutoring program for students who would benefit from extra help with fundamental reading skills. Volunteers are needed to come in once per week (Tuesday, Wednesday, or Thursday) during the school year.
